TEXT.TITLE: NORTH YEMEN BOUGHT WHITE SUGAR AT TENDER - TRADE
TEXT.BODY: North Yemen at its weekend tender bought white sugar from a French operator acting on behalf of a Swiss house at 214.70 dlrs a tonne c and f, traders said. The amount bought was not immediately available, although the country had sought 30,000 tonnes of June arrival whites, they said. REUTER
